list.name: status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster =~ /k8s/

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "nginx" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "nginx" WHERE "environment_label" = '$environment'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - last("value")  FROM "k8s_nodes_percent" WHERE "environment_label" =~ /^$environment$/ AND "status" = 'not_ready' AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_memory_rss" WHERE "service" = 'grafana-server' AND "hostname" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_memory_rss" WHERE "service" = 'grafana-server' AND "hostname" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_memory_rss" WHERE "service" = 'grafana-server' AND "hostname" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

list.name: environment
list.query: show tag values from cpu_idle with key = environment_label

list.name: master
list.query: show tag values from process_threads with key="hostname" where service =~ /scheduler/ and environment_label =~ /^$environment$/

list.name: pool
list.query: show tag values from process_threads with key="hostname" where service =~ /kubelet/ and environment_label =~ /^$environment$/

list.name: process
list.query: show tag values from process_threads with key="service" where service =~ /k8s/
